Integral Development Corporation does not have DLP tools and/or controls installed to monitor encrypted and unencrypted email, password protected/encrypted attachments, egress points and removable media to prevent unauthorized disclosure of its customer data.

 - Integral Development Corporation does not perform an information security risk assessment or Threat and Vulnerability Risk Assessment (TVRA) on its data and key process.

 Formal internal Information Security Risk Assessment (SOC Audit is an external assessment) is required to close and must capture the following:
1. Scope of the risk assessment
2. Date of risk assessment
3. Documentation of the risk assessment results
4. Review of the risk assessment results
5. Dissemination of risk assessment results to stakeholders
6. Assess / Update the information security risks and security controls applicable to the information asset and its environment of operation on a regularly scheduled basis or whenever there are significant changes.
